channel.title: The Veil: Veil'd Fantasy (May W 8PM EDT)
channel.description:
I have added five sessions of urban fantasy hack of *The Veil* for Wednesdays in May. General RSVPs open March 28th. We will reskin that PbtA cyberpunk game to explore the lives of characters in a high fantasy city. Attendance at all sessions is encouraged, but not required. Rules will be taught. In session one we will create characters, establish connections, and see how the city’s crushing your spirits.
We will use a city built by Gauntleteers in a *Microscope* session. You can see those details here. We will take the Ban list from that as our basis. Details from that session will work as established fiction, but we’ll have room to develop new neighborhoods, change the city through our actions, and add new concepts.
Sessions run 2 1/2 to 3 hours. If you sign up and your attendance or RSVP changes, please also send me a message at edige23 at gmail. I will send out a group email a week before the session with set up and invite details.
[The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html) will be in play and safety tool [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg)) will be in use.
[date=2019-05-01 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-05-01 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LaV7QsdttA1MQ-TYbYs) [date=2019-05-08 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-05-08 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LaV7j6dOKufnKWnDt4o) [date=2019-05-015 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-05-15 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LaV83qGNAnCGiEhANeL) [date=2019-05-22 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-05-22 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LaV8JOOG_2rIaZwlZCu) [date=2019-05-29 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-05-29 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 5](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LaV8flOlUs85bsg6JQ-)
